title: Saving Caroline
description: After a tragic accident kills her family Caroline unexpectedly moves to Alabama in an effort to start over but her nightmares and panic attacks hinder her ability to move on. Trick's intrigued by the new waitress working at his bar but after some strange behavior he's determined to break through her walls and help her heal if she'll let him. Only thing is- she seems hell bent on keeping him at arms length.
author: K. Larsen
